alert.note: Alert for Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 22 at 7:03PM CDT until March 22 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL TUSCALOOSA COUNTY... At 703 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Holt, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tuscaloosa, Northport, Holt, Brookwood, Coaling, McFarland Mall, Tuscaloosa Amphitheater, Bryant Denny Stadium, Lake Wildwood, University Mall, Deerlick Creek Campgrounds, Bankhead Lock And Dam, Bull City, Lake Tuscaloosa, Cottondale, East Brookwood, Peterson, Lake Harris, Lake Nicol and Lake Tuscaloosa Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for west central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
